MLX Chat uses speech recognition to convert your voice input into text, allowing you to interact with the AI assistant hands-free.
MLX Chat needs access to your microphone to enable voice input for hands-free interaction with the AI assistant.
MLX Chat may use your camera to capture images for sharing with the AI assistant.
MLX Chat may access your photo library to allow you to share images with the AI assistant.
MLX Chat may save generated images or content to your photo library.
MLX Chat may use your location to provide location-aware responses and context.
MLX Chat may access your contacts to help with contact-related queries and tasks.
MLX Chat may access your calendar to help with scheduling and event-related queries.
MLX Chat may access your reminders to help manage tasks and to-do lists.
MLX Chat may use Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices and accessories.
MLX Chat may access your local network to connect with compatible devices and services.
MLX Chat may access your Apple Music library to help with music-related queries and tasks.
MLX Chat may access your HomeKit accessories to help control your smart home devices.
